bio: A Yo-criminal on the run in BBQ! He’s on the run for claiming on live TV that he was abducted by aliens.

soultimate.name: Bogus Bunny Beam
soultimate.description: Use a pale blue flame to hit foes with big damage.

skill.effect: Increases the power of X button moves by 40%.
skill.name: Xtreme!

name: Intrudapyon
